revised_title: The Development and Structure of Vascular Dentine in Teeth
tldr: The author examines the development and structure of vascular dentine in teeth, specifically focusing on vaso-dentine and osteo-dentine. They describe the arrangement of tubes and channels within these types of dentine and discuss their contents and formation. The study provides a better understanding of the different varieties of dental tissue and their classification.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Anatomy and Development
